biography.value:
A shoosuva is a hyena-demon gifted by Yeenoghu to an especially powerful worshiper (typically a gnoll fang of Yeenoghu;fang of Yeenoghu; see the Monster Manual). A shoosuva manifests shortly after a Yeenoghu-worshiping war band achieves a great victory, emerging from a billowing, fetid cloud of smoke as it arrives from the Abyss. In battle, the demon wraps its slavering jaws around one victim while lashing out with the poisonous stinger on its tail to bring down another. A creature immobilized by the poison becomes easy pickings for any nearby members of the war band.

Each shoosuva is bonded to a particular worshiper of YeenoghuÂ and fights alongside its master. A gnoll that has been gifted with a shoosuva is second only to a flind in status within a war band dedicated to Yeenoghu.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The shoosuva makes one Bite attack and one Tail Stinger attack.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 4d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, and the target must succeed on a [[/save con 14 format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned}. While &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} in this way, the target is also &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the shoosuva can move up to half its speed and make one Bite attack.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
